issue.title: [Packaging] crossbow submit results in duplicate Travis CI build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2877](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2877). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I ran

```Java

$ python crossbow.py submit wheel-osx-cp36m
```

and two Travis builds were created, see https://travis-ci.org/wesm/crossbow/branches and build-5-wheel-osx-cp36m. Not sure why

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2877?focusedCommentId=16549391) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Probably because it builds the git tag too, looking into it.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2877?focusedCommentId=16549871) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Ah, sounds likely.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2877?focusedCommentId=16551771) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2296
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2296>
